attributes.action: Review the size engine cars that inexperienced drivers are allowed to drive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After passing a driving test, inexperienced drivers are more likely to be invovled in an injury accident.  This is exacerbated by young or inexperienced drivers being put into control of high powered vehicle and being unable to control the power at their disposal.  I beleive that all drivers having passed a driving test should be limited to driving a 1400cc car or lower for a period of 24 months.
